you want to have a display on the machine itself that displays data about current status.  That data probably include speed information gained from encoders.  Is that correct?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf so, then, NetworkTables is the right thing.  The rio writes to the table, the data is transferred to the Pi, and the Pi displays it.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eIf you’re looking to have the encoder signal sent directly to the Pi, that’s a lot more complicated – the Pi isn’t really set up for that.  You’d probably have to get some sort of hat/daughterboard that processes the encoder signals.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2022-04-06T17:56:57.690Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":75,"readers_count":74,"score":30.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":408020,"topic_slug":"possibility-of-roborio-encoder-signal-sending-to-raspberry-pi-4b","display_username":"CEF","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28649,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/possibility-of-roborio-encoder-signal-sending-to-raspberry-pi-4b/408020/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3061933,"name":"","username":"signalfade","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/9de0a6/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-05-16T20:01:06.562Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eDo you need the RoboRIO at all?
